file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 28-20-00-06 - DISTRIBUTION - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DISTRIBUTION - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the fuel line shroud drains. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FUEL LINE SHROUD DRAINS - INSPEC- ALL 28-20-00-200-801-A ♦ TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 28-20-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 28-20-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FUEL LINE SHROUD DRAINS - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task is done during the routine inspection of the aircraft. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 193 Wing to fuselage rear fairing D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Underwing surface I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. J. Visually Check Fuel Line Shroud Drains for Absence of Fuel Leakage (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Visually check fuel line shroud drains for absence of fuel leakage and general condition.
